# vue的所有生命周期的钩子

export const LIFECYCLE_HOOKS = [
  'beforeCreate',
  'created',
  'beforeMount',
  'mounted',
  'beforeUpdate',
  'updated',
  'beforeDestroy',
  'destroyed',
  'activated',
  'deactivated',
  'errorCaptured',
  'serverPrefetch' //浏览器端没有该生命周期
]
